resources.string: "We need the following permissions for this app to work properly. Since these " "permissions are among the protected permissions, to grant them to the app you " "need to use the adb shell command on the PC or from the terminal with root access."
We need this permission to identify and set the status of the tile correctly.
We need this permission to change demo mode settings.
For this app to work, it needs %1$s permission to be granted. Unfortunately that is only possible through adb shell from your PC:\n\nadb -d shell pm grant %2$s %3$s

For this app to work it needs DUMP permission to be granted. Unfortunately that is only possible through adb shell from your computer:

adb -d shell pm grant ir.alirezaivaz.demo_mode android.permission.DUMP

For transparency this app's source code is available.

For this app to work it needs WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission to be granted. Unfortunately that is only possible through adb shell from your computer:

adb -d shell pm grant ir.alirezaivaz.demo_mode android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS

For transparency this app's source code is available.
Both permissions need to be granted for the tile to work
"Please make sure you're turned on demo mode in developer options; " "Because the tile won't works properly until you turned it on!"
